author: cnbc.com
title: Orocobre Limited Half Year Financial Results 2018 Webcast
text:
BRISBANE, Australia, Feb. 21, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Orocobre Limited (ORE:ASX ORL:TSX) ( Orocobre or the Company ) will release 2018 Half Year Financial Results on Friday 23 February 2018. Managing Director, Mr Richard Seville will conduct a briefing at 10.30am AEST (Brisbane time). A live audio webcast of this briefing will be available on Orocobre's website at www.orocobre.com . Written questions maybe submitted via the webcast.
An archive copy of the briefing and Q&A session will subsequently be made available on the company website.
For more information please contact:
Andrew Barber
Investor Relations Manager
T: +61 7 3871 3985
M: +61 418 783 701
E: abarber@orocobre.com
Please visit www.orocobre.com
